channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung’s New Wi-Fi Speaker Has Big Monolith Energy
item.description: Playing the theme to '2001: A Space Odyssey' on this thing might feel a little too on-the-nose.

item.title: Ryan Coogler’s Original Plan for Chadwick Boseman in ‘Black Panther 2’ Was So Good
item.description: It involved T'Challa's son, and, somehow, we are now even sadder about it all.

item.title: New 'serial' tech will significantly reduce the cost of memory — HBM memory, that is, the sort of RAM only AI hyperscalers can use, but hey, at least they won't go after consumer RAM, or would they?
item.description: SPHBM4 uses serialization and organic substrates to lower HBM packaging costs while keeping bandwidth memory exclusive to hyperscale AI systems.

item.title: China drafting first of its kind emotional safety regulation for AI
item.description: A draft document by China's Cyberspace Administration outlines sticter oversight of minors and chatbot companions.

item.title: AI slop and brainrot content now make up 1 in 2 YouTube Shorts recommendations, study reveals
item.description: New research shows YouTube’s algorithm is heavily promoting low-quality AI-generated and “brainrot” videos, making up a large share of what new users see.

item.title: After nearly 10 years, Twist Bioscience spin-off plans Terabyte-scale DNA storage in 2026, intending to store 13TB of data in a 'single drop of water.'
item.description: Atlas Data Storage plans terabyte-scale DNA storage by 2026, aiming to store massive data in tiny, highly dense volumes.

item.title: Memory shortage: Framework raises DDR5 RAM prices again with a per GB price hike
item.description: Memory shortages driven by the AI boom are causing prices to balloon for consumers, as seen in this price hike from DIY laptop brand Framework

item.title: Trump’s Crusade Against ‘Woke’ Climate Research Threatens Solar Science
item.description: The National Center for Atmospheric Research not only investigates weather on Earth, but also in space.

item.title: No Avian Will Escape This 360-Camera Bird Feeder
item.description: Why miss a single second of your local birds' feeding frenzy?

item.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Season 3 Is Recasting an ‘Avengers’ Actor
item.description: Marvel's new Falcon, Danny Ramirez, will not be returning for season 3 of the HBO show.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Finally Used ChatGPT
item.description: Many are dropping their skepticism. Bernie Sanders isn't.

item.title: CES 2026 — What to expect
item.description: CES 2026 will be big, busy, and full of AI but with incremental updates across many, many tech categories.
